questions.question: What are some properties of an instance type?
questions.answer: vCPUs, Memory, Instance Storage, Network Performance

questions.question: What is a Family Type?
questions.answer: Instance Types with simlar settings are grouped into Family Types to help find the right settings for your needs

questions.question: Name the different Family Types
questions.answer: Micro Instances, General Purpose, Compute Optimized, GPU Instances, FPGA Instances, Memory Optimized, Storage Optimized

questions.question: What are some Instance Purchasing Options?
questions.answer: On-Demand Instances, Reserved Instances, Scheduled Instances, Spot Instances, On-Demand Capacity Reservations

questions.question: What is a security group?
questions.answer: An instance level firewall allowing you to restrict Ingress and Egress traffic by specifying what traffic is allowed to communicate with that instance

questions.question: What are some options of a Security Group to restrict inbound and outbound communication to an EC2 instance?
If an EC2 instance is stopped, ephemoral storage is lost
If an EC2 instance is rebooted, ephemoral storage is lost
